titleStmt.title: The loyal Protestants vindication, fairly offered to all those sober minds who have the art of using reason, and the power of suppressing passion by a Queen Elizabeth Protestant.
titleStmt.author: Queen Elizabeth Protestant.
Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
